## Practice Data

- [TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday#datasets) A collection of data sources for practicing data analysis and visualization. New releases each Tuesday.

- [Example Data Sets for data-to-viz.com](https://github.com/holtzy/data_to_viz/tree/master/Example_dataset) A collection of data sets used for the excellent data visualization guide [data-to-viz.com](https://www.data-to-viz.com/).

- [FiveThrityEight Data](https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data) Data from articles published on [fivethirtyeight.com](https://fivethirtyeight.com)
